com.cmput301w17t07.moody

Class FollowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w17t07.moody.FollowController

  • public class FollowController
extends java.lang.Object
    FollowController communicates with the ElasticSearchFollowController and passes all the following/follower Lists to the DB
